metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11558 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libgpac.a in GPAC 0.8.0, as demonstrated byMP4Box. audio_sample_entry_Read in isomedia/box_code_base.c does notproperly decide when to make gf_isom_box_del calls. This leads to varioususe-after-free outcomes involving mdia_Read, gf_isom_delete_movie, andgf_isom_parse_movie_boxes.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
